title: Fort Stanwix National Monument: Maps
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Maps              Maps      Â    Local Site Map 264kb PDF file Map of Fort Stanwix NM and its visitor center, where parking is, and all main roads adjacent.  Directions to Rome Map 12kb GIF file Map of main routes into west, south, and east Rome. Regional Map 17kb GIF file Located in the middle of the state meant that all traffic going east or west across New York in the 18th century came under the guns of Fort Stanwix.
